item.xml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" escapeChar="\" singleChar="?"> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>idDelete?</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" escapeChar="\" singleChar="?"> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>idDelete*</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" escapeChar="\" singleChar="?"> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>id*lete*</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <csw:GetRecords xmlns:csw="http://www.opengis.net/cat/csw/2.0.2" xmlns:ogc="http://www.opengis.net/ogc" service="CSW" resultType="RESULTS"> <csw:Query> <csw:ElementSetName>summary</csw:ElementSetName> <csw:Constraint version="1.1.0"> <ogc:Filter> <ogc:And> <ogc:PropertyIsLike wildCard="*" escapeChar="\" singleChar="?"> <ogc:PropertyName>title</ogc:PropertyName> <ogc:Literal>*d*lete*</ogc:Literal> </ogc:PropertyIsLike> </ogc:And> </ogc:Filter> </csw:Constraint> </csw:Query> </csw:GetRecords>
